HTMLOptGroupElementDisabled.summary: The disabled property of the interface is a boolean value that reflects the {{htmlelement("optgroup")}} element's disabled attribute, which indicates whether the control is disabled.

remarks.para: When disabled, the option element descendants of the <optgroup> element are unusable, un-clickable, and unselectable. These disabled <option>s will match the :disabled selector, even if their disabled property value is false.
